_header: Saint John witness as well will seem
_description: Gospel for Whit-Monday in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Iohn witnes als wele wil semeHow crist said vnto nichodeme…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þarfore a tale here will I tellffor swilk a thing how it bifell
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dixit ihesu crist cuidam principi.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia ii proxima Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 96rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.229-231.
